transcript.title: Opening of the Thirty-Eighth Parliament
transcript.content:
The Thirty-Eighth Parliament will assemble at 10.30am on Tuesday 30 April 1996.

His Excellency, the Governor-General, wvill deliver the opening speech at approximately 3.00pm.

The proclamation fixing the time and day of the opening has been signed by the Governor-General and will be published in the Government Gazette today.

9 April 1996
